alert.note: Alert for Southern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brantley, east central Ware and northwestern Charlton Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Braganza, or 10 miles south of Waycross, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Hickox, Braganza, Race Pond, Fort Mudge and Winokur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
